Reviews.Title: “Great Locacation-Disappointed in closed Bar”
Reviews.Author: summerjenny
Reviews.Content: excited overnight trip nyc chose helmsley based past reviews arrived noon checkin time nice wonderful lady front desk wasnt ready nice corner abound 5pm busy stood line finished checking lady didnt acknowledge walked waited waited finally worker post closed told rude anyways waiting 30 minutes told barrestaraunt closed renovations process disappointing nice view nice bath products updates overall price

Reviews.Title: “Average”
Reviews.Author: emananon
Reviews.Content: maybe hotels nyc hotel average looking tv fading call batteries remote call fix leaking faucet handle checked offering guests size average staff polite stayed evenings december 16 17 2011

Reviews.Title: “A lovely old lady with a face lift”
Reviews.Author: PollyVousFrancais
Reviews.Content: night helmsley business lovely excellent service amenities youd expect except minibar oh please tell hotels stop charging inroom wifi bathroom updated marble sinks looked snazzy closer inspection realized cosmetic facelift aging grande dame hotel cleverly overall impression thoroughly modern hotel delightful stay concierge central location worth lot cant expense breakfast try nearby delis rude shock

Reviews.Title: “best secret everyone knows about is CLOSED, SOLD!!!”
Reviews.Author: snowdogflyer
Reviews.Content: love hotel location amazing house breakfast restaraunt useful amazing gift shop manhattan 10000 restaraunts 110th walking distance direction hour night day half price run mill waste eat restaraunts breakfasts 10 15 hotels 23 dont wrong coffee continental breakfast head downtown impersonal hotel start 2 3x shame closed 2010 real shame

Reviews.Title: “Absolutely Excellent!!!”
Reviews.Author: LittleMissForgetful
Reviews.Content: 2nd stay helmsley stayed 2006 impressed didnt consider else perfectly located shoppingsightseeing pleasant stroll 5th avenue times square etc chose suite visits family 4 immaculately clean size fresh bed linen towels provided day complimentary continental breakfast brilliant help yourself enjoy staff friendly extremely helpful mark hail cab outside hotel organised town car airport recommended helmsley friends excellent stays

HotelInfo.Name: Helmsley Middletowne Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: 148 E. 48th St., New York City, NY 10017
